resources.string:
Please share and rate it!

If you want to help developer in his work download:


Donation App

Welcome to App Shortcuts Library!

This is an Open Source library and available on GitHub.

The Android App Shortcuts Library have features of Android 7.1 Nougat, you can implement in your launcher shortcuts starting from API 14!
For more detail visit GitHub Page.

This library is under Apache v2 License, and all right reserved to Michele Lacorte.

If you like this library please help developer and Donate or download Donation App.

App Version v1.4

Library Version v1.4.0
